parameters.query:
WITH tokyo_today AS (
  -- Get current date in Tokyo timezone
  SELECT (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Tokyo')::date AS today_tokyo
),
live_games AS (
  SELECT id as game_id
  FROM public.games, tokyo_today
  WHERE (game_datetime AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Tokyo')::date = tokyo_today.today_tokyo
    AND (status = 'Live' 
         OR (status = 'Scheduled' 
             AND game_datetime <= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP + INTERVAL '30 minutes'
             AND NOT COALESCE(is_time_tbd, false)))
),
pending_sync_tasks AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT (payload->>'game_id')::text as game_id
  FROM public.task_queue
  WHERE task_type = 'SYNC_LIVE_GAME'
    AND status IN ('PENDING', 'PROCESSING')
),
games_needing_sync AS (
  SELECT lg.game_id
  FROM live_games lg
  LEFT JOIN pending_sync_tasks pt ON lg.game_id = pt.game_id
  WHERE pt.game_id IS NULL
),
today_summary AS (
  SELECT 
    COUNT(*) as total_games,
    SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'Final' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as finished_games,
    SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'Live' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as live_games,
    SUM(CASE WHEN status IN ('Live', 'Scheduled') AND status != 'Final' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as active_games
  FROM public.games, tokyo_today
  WHERE (game_datetime AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Tokyo')::date = tokyo_today.today_tokyo
),
wrap_up_check AS (
  SELECT EXISTS(
    SELECT 1 
    FROM public.task_queue 
    WHERE task_type = 'DAILY_WRAP_UP' 
      AND (created_at AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Tokyo')::date = (SELECT today_tokyo FROM tokyo_today)
  ) as wrap_up_exists
),
first_game_notified AS (
  SELECT EXISTS(
    SELECT 1 
    FROM public.task_queue 
    WHERE task_type = 'FIRST_GAME_NOTIFIED' 
      AND (created_at AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Tokyo')::date = (SELECT today_tokyo FROM tokyo_today)
  ) as already_notified
),
has_started_games AS (
  SELECT EXISTS(
    SELECT 1 
    FROM public.games, tokyo_today 
    WHERE (game_datetime AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Tokyo')::date = tokyo_today.today_tokyo
      AND (status IN ('Live', 'Final')
           OR (status = 'Scheduled' 
               AND game_datetime <= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP + INTERVAL '30 minutes'
               AND NOT COALESCE(is_time_tbd, false)))
  ) as has_started
)
SELECT 
  COALESCE((SELECT json_agg(game_id) FROM games_needing_sync), '[]'::json) as games_to_sync,
  (SELECT total_games FROM today_summary) as total_games,
  (SELECT finished_games FROM today_summary) as finished_games,
  (SELECT live_games FROM today_summary) as live_games,
  -- New field: has active games (Live or not yet finished)
  CASE 
    WHEN (SELECT live_games FROM today_summary) > 0 
         OR ((SELECT total_games FROM today_summary) > 0 
             AND (SELECT finished_games FROM today_summary) < (SELECT total_games FROM today_summary)
             AND (SELECT has_started FROM has_started_games))
    THEN true
    ELSE false
  END as has_active_games,
  CASE 
    WHEN (SELECT total_games FROM today_summary) > 0 
         AND (SELECT total_games FROM today_summary) = (SELECT finished_games FROM today_summary)
         AND NOT (SELECT wrap_up_exists FROM wrap_up_check)
    THEN true
    ELSE false
  END as should_wrap_up,
  CASE 
    WHEN (SELECT has_started FROM has_started_games)
         AND NOT (SELECT already_notified FROM first_game_notified)
    THEN true
    ELSE false
  END as should_notify_first_game;

=INSERT INTO public.task_queue (task_type, status, payload, created_at)
SELECT 
  'SYNC_LIVE_GAME',
  'PENDING',
  jsonb_build_object('game_id', game_id::text),
  NOW()
FROM jsonb_array_elements_text('{{ JSON.stringify($('Get Games & Status').item.json.games_to_sync) }}'::jsonb) as game_id
RETURNING id, payload->>'game_id' as game_id;

RETURNING id;
